featured.text: When the kernels start 38 , shake the pot to let the steam escape and to let the unpopped kernels fall to the bottom.

definition.zh_def: 未爆裂的，指未被加熱或處理而未膨脹的狀態。
definition.en_def: Not having been popped; referring to kernels that have not expanded or burst.
definition.example: I found some unpopped popcorn kernels at the bottom of the bowl.
